subject: Engagement of Personnel by Contractor in EPC Projects.

No. 213951)} Sub: Engagement of Personnel by Contractor in EPC Projects -reg: In the EPC projects, the Contractors are required to design and execute the projects. Therefore, it is essential that the EPC Contractors deploy qualified and experienced professional for design and execution. 2_ Clause 4.4 of the EPC document provides that "The Contractor shall ensure that the personnel engaged by it or by its Subcontractors in the performance of its obligations under this Agreement are at all times appropriately and adequately qualified, skilled and experienced in their respective functions in conformity with Good Industry Practice. 3 The qualifications of respective personnels considering Good Industry Practice are enclosed at Annexure-A. 4_ All ROs and PIUs shall ensure the deployment of the personnel as per Annexure-A on the projects under their jurisdiction. 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
